categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military units
Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Ginger group was a group of three Delta-class DX-9 stormtrooper transports that served the Rebel Alliance. They were involved in the Second Battle of Javin. They were launched from the recently captured Outpost D-34 platform. They attacked the Frigate Fogger but all three were destroyed.
